mapper.insert: insert into book (id, name, jiage, chubanshe, zhuangtai, jieshuren, fenlei, f_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chubanshe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jieshuren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fenlei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update book set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiage = #{jiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chubanshe = #{chubanshe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuangtai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jieshuren = #{jieshuren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fenlei = #{fenlei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_id = #{fId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, jiage, chubanshe, zhuangtai, jieshuren, fenlei, f_id from book
